data.title: Brian Helfrich
data.text:
Speak Softly: Vast Majority Of NFL Team Execs Elect To Stay Off Twitter

As the '11 NFL season kicked off Thursday night, a study by SportsBusiness Daily shows that fewer than a dozen top-level NFL team execs are confirmed to be on Twitter. Colts Owner Jim Irsay’s quirky and candid posts quickly made him a must-follow after he joined the social media...

FullCircle Ventures To Represent Pocono Raceway For Marketing

FullCircle Ventures will announce as early as today a new multiyear partnership with Pocono Raceway to represent the Pennsylvania track in marketing initiatives. As part of the deal, the Charlotte-based firm will aim to find a naming-rights partner for Pocono. In addition, FullCircle will focus on corporate sponsorship, race...

Sport And Social Impact Leadership Summit Being Held At Penn

Athletes For Hope and the Wharton Sports Business Initiative today are hosting the inaugural Sport and Social Impact Leadership Summit at the Univ. of Pennsylvania. The one-day event will feature four discussions aimed at increasing impact by the sports philanthropy community. The forum will facilitate analysis of philanthropic commitments...

Retail Sports Marketing Team Wins World Of Outlaws Agency Challenge

World Racing Group last night hosted the inaugural World of Outlaws Agency Challenge at East Lincoln Speedway in Stanley, N.C., pitting nine agencies against one another on the dirt track. Retail Sports Marketing bested the other agencies, all with a presence in Charlotte, racing to victory in...

World Of Outlaws Agency Challenge Held Tonight Near Charlotte

World Racing Group tonight is hosting the inaugural World of Outlaws Agency Challenge at East Lincoln Speedway in Stanley, N.C., pitting nine agencies against one another on the dirt track. The agencies, all with a presence in Charlotte, will send two employees to race both World of Outlaws...

Several Motorsports Execs Team Up To Form FullCircle Agency

Veteran motorsports executives Chris Biby , Matt Crews and Jay Schulthess today will announce the formation of FullCircle Ventures, a sports management and marketing firm focused on representation of athletes, entertainers and properties in motorsports. Motortsports Management Int’l (MMI) Founder Cary Agajanian ,...

Motorsports Execs Team Up To Form Agency, Will Rep Several NASCAR Drivers

Veteran motorsports executives Chris Biby, Matt Crews and Jay Schulthess on Friday announced the formation of FullCircle Ventures, a sports management and marketing firm focused on representation of athletes, entertainers and properties in motorsports. Panel Of CMOs Discusses Importance Of Sports At IMG WCOS

Some of the biggest marketers in sports gathered on a panel at the IMG World Congress Of Sports this morning to address why sports continue to provide a worthy marketing platform for brands. “It’s very important for our brand,” Subway Senior VP & CMO Tony Pace said....

NFLPA's Kessler Concludes IMG WCOS With Discussion On Labor

SportsBusiness Journal/SportsBusiness Daily’s IMG World Congress of Sports concluded Thursday with a discussion centered around the hottest topic in sports business: labor. NFLPA outside counsel Jeffrey Kessler provided some insight into what the decertified NFLPA envisions could come about if Judge Susan Nelson rules in...
